changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION ruleform.automatically_generate_implicit_jobs_for_explicit_jobs() RETURNS trigger AS 'com.hellblazer.CoRE.event.animation.JobAnimations.automatically_generate_implicit_jobs_for_explicit_jobs' LANGUAGE javaU VOLATILE COST 100; ALTER FUNCTION ruleform.automatically_generate_implicit_jobs_for_explicit_jobs() OWNER TO core;
